description: A person is working behind a bar counter, preparing a drink using a blender and various ingredients. The camera moves from a close-up of the counter and plants to a wider view of the person at work, then zooms in on the preparation process.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: It is more logical and common that the person is to the right of the napkin, rather than the napkin being to the right of the person; flipping subject and object aligns better with typical spatial descriptions.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped
